alert.note: Alert for Gogebic; Ontonagon (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 04 at 4:07PM EST until January 05 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM EST /9 PM CST/ THIS EVENING TO 7 PM EST /6 PM CST/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches...locally higher to around 15 inches within the higher terrain areas such as the Porcupine Mountains. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Ontonagon and Gogebic counties. * WHEN...From 10 PM EST /9 PM CST/ this evening to 7 PM EST /6 PM CST/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact both the morning and evening commutes on Wednesday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
